name: Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds
description: Compact wireless earbuds with high-fidelity sound, deep bass, and a comfortable in-ear fit. Includes a charging case offering up to 20 hours of playback and Bluetooth 5.2 connectivity.

name: Smartwatch Series 5
description: Track your fitness, heart rate, and sleep with this stylish smartwatch. Features customizable watch faces, call and message notifications, and water resistance up to 50 meters.

name: Phone Case (Black Matte)
description: Slim and durable black matte phone case that provides excellent grip and protection from drops and scratches. Compatible with most standard smartphone models.

name: Noise Cancelling Headphones
description: Over-ear noise-cancelling headphones designed for immersive listening. Features 40mm drivers, soft ear cushions, and up to 30 hours of wireless playback on a single charge.

name: 4K Smart TV 43"
description: Stunning 43-inch 4K Ultra HD Smart TV with HDR10 support and built-in apps for Netflix, YouTube, and Prime Video. Includes voice control and dual-band Wi-Fi for smooth streaming.

name: Gaming Mouse RGB
description: Ergonomic gaming mouse with adjustable DPI up to 7200, RGB backlighting, and programmable buttons. Designed for precision, comfort, and long gaming sessions.

name: Mechanical Keyboard RGB
description: Tactile mechanical keyboard with hot-swappable switches, customizable RGB lighting, and durable aluminum frame ideal for gamers and typists.

name: Wireless Charging Pad
description: Fast wireless charging pad compatible with Qi-enabled devices. Sleek aluminum design with non-slip surface and overheat protection.

name: Smart LED Bulb
description: Wi-Fi-enabled smart LED bulb controllable via app or voice assistant. Offers millions of colors, dimming options, and energy efficiency.

name: Portable Bluetooth Speaker
description: Water-resistant portable speaker with punchy bass, long battery life, and Bluetooth 5.0. Perfect for outdoor use.

name: Smart Home Hub
description: Central hub for managing all smart home devices with voice and app control. Supports Wi-Fi, Zigbee, and Bluetooth connectivity.

name: Laptop Backpack
description: Stylish and durable laptop backpack with anti-theft design, USB charging port, and padded compartments for 15.6-inch laptops.

name: Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo
description: Reliable wireless combo with silent keys, ergonomic design, and long battery life — ideal for office or home use.

name: Smartphone Tripod Stand
description: Adjustable tripod stand with Bluetooth remote shutter and 360° rotation for stable photos and videos.

name: Gaming Headset with Mic
description: High-quality surround sound gaming headset with detachable mic, soft ear cushions, and RGB side lighting.
